structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Judges And Registers Of Probate And Insolvency

law.catch_line: Plymouth Probate Court; Deputy Assistant Registers
law.text: The register of the Plymouth probate and family court may, with the approval of the chief justice of the probate and family court, designate 5 employees as deputy assistant registers with the same powers as assistant registers and with the approval of the chief justice remove a deputy assistant register. The deputy assistant registers shall receive in addition to their salaries as employees, a salary of $6,000 per annum.
